question: The term “White Stork”, which was recently in news, is:
option4: type of a radiological dispersal device (RDD)
explanation: “White Stork” is an automated cargo spacecraft launched by Japan. It is a “space junk” collector that has been made with the help of a fishnet company. The spacecraft aims at clearing up tonnes of space clutter including cast-off equipment from old satellites and pieces of rocket.
